MissingAuthorizationHeader: The request is missing the Authorization header. This header is required for authentication.
TokenNotProvided: The authentication token is not provided. Please include a valid token in the request.
TokenVerificationFailed: Failed to verify the authentication token. Please check the token validity and try again.
InternalServerError: An internal server error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
NotAbleToRetrievingData: An error occurred while retrieving {{data}}. Please check your request and try again later.
UserNotFound: User not found with the provided id/email {{uuid}}. Please verify the information and try again.
UserAlreadyExist: A user with the email address {{email}} already exists in the system. Please use a different email.
UnableToCreateUser: Unable to create a user with the email address {{email}}. Please check the provided information and try again.
InvalidEmailOrPassword: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
InvalidEmail: Invalid email address provided. Please provide a valid email address.
InvalidPassword: Invalid password provided. Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
InvalidName: Invalid name provided. Please provide a valid name.
LoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
Forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
TokenRefreshFailed: Failed to refresh token. Please log in again.
CookieNotFound: No cookie found in the request. Please ensure that cookies are enabled and try again.
InvalidUuid: Invalid UUID provided. Please provide a correctly formatted UUID and try again.
NotAbleToSendEmailVerificationLink: Failed to send the email verification link. Please try again later.
TokenNotFound: Verification token not found. Please request a new verification email.
TokenExpired: Verification token has expired. Please request a new verification email.
UnableToVerifyToken: Unable to verify the token. Please request a new verification email.
UserUpdateFailed: Failed to update user. Please try again later.
InvalidBase64: Image must be provided in base64 format.
EmailVerificationRequired: Email verification is required to proceed.
